position: Aspire - Product Lead | ex-Revolut | INSEAD | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Senior Manager, Strategy & Operations
experience.description: I was part of the small team that launched Revolut in Singapore in 2019. I was responsible for card payments - acquiring, issuing and logistics. I launched the Metal plan (including the metal cards) and Rewards (cashback for top brands) in Singapore. I launched several growth campaigns and found various avenues to improve gross margins. I also worked briefly on setting up operations for Revolut India. My main focus was on fund flows, bank partnerships and card payments.
experience.description_html: I was part of the small team that launched Revolut in Singapore in 2019. I was responsible for card payments - acquiring, issuing and logistics. I launched the Metal plan (including the metal cards) and Rewards (cashback for top brands) in Singapore. I launched several growth campaigns and found various avenues to improve gross margins. I also worked briefly on setting up operations for Revolut India. My main focus was on fund flows, bank partnerships and card payments. <!---->
